name: common-externals
description: Shared vendor libraries that need to be bundled with tiki

devDependenciesComment.moment: A lot of libraries depend on this
devDependenciesComment.sortablejs: Used by legacy js code menubuilder and structures, not just newer libraries like kanban, so needs to be able to be independently included.  Dependency of https://github.com/SortableJS/Vue.Draggable which sadly hasn't moved in 2 years and is stuck at 1.14.0.  Pinning so we don't have a different version in the workspace from the global.  Otherwise dynamic module loading would make it hard to tell.
